00013   cerr << "tcp_server k|u port\n";

00016 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00017 {
00018   char buf[512];
00019   sockaddr_in server_sa, client_sa;
00020   int cfd, fd, rc;
00021 
00022   if (argc!=3) {
00023     usage();
00024     exit(-1);
00025   }
00026 
00027   if (toupper(argv[1][0])=='K') {
00028     cerr << "Using kernel stack.\n";
00029     if (minet_init(MINET_KERNEL)<0) {
00030       cerr << "Stack initialization failed.\n";
00031       goto err;
00032     } else {
00033       cerr << "Stack initialized.\n";
00034     }
00035   } else {
00036     cerr << "Using Minet User Level Stack.\n";
00037     if (minet_init(MINET_USER)<0) {
00038       cerr << "Stack initialization failed.\n";
00039       goto err;
00040     } else {
00041       cerr << "Stack initialized.\n";
00042     }
00043   }
00044 
00045   bzero(&server_sa,sizeof(server_sa));
00046   server_sa.sin_family=AF_INET;
00047   server_sa.sin_addr.s_addr=htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00048   server_sa.sin_port=htons(atoi(argv[2]));
00049 
00050   cfd = minet_socket(SOCK_STREAM);
00051 
00052   if (cfd<0) {
00053     cerr << "Can't create socket.\n";
00054     minet_perror("reason:");
00055     goto err;
00056   } else {
00057     cerr << "Socket created.\n";
00058   }
00059 
00060   if (minet_bind(cfd,&server_sa)<0) {
00061     cerr << "Can't bind socket.\n";
00062     minet_perror("reason:");
00063     goto err;
00064   } else {
00065     cerr << "Socket bound.\n";
00066   }
00067 
00068   if (minet_listen(cfd,1)<0) {
00069     cerr << "Can't listen on socket.\n";
00070     minet_perror("reason:");
00071     goto err;
00072   } else {
00073     cerr << "Socket listened.\n";
00074   }
00075 
00076   if ((fd=minet_accept(cfd,&client_sa))<0) {
00077     cerr << "Accept failed.\n";
00078     minet_perror("reason:");
00079     goto err;
00080   } else {
00081     cerr << "Accept succeeded.\n";
00082   }
00083 
00084   cout << "Beginning to echo text.\n";
00085 
00086   while (1) {
00087     if ((rc=minet_read(fd,buf,512))<0) {
00088       cerr << "Read failed.\n";
00089       minet_perror("reason:");
00090       goto err;
00091     }
00092     if (rc==0) {
00093       cerr << "Done.\n";
00094       goto done;
00095     }
00096     if (write(fileno(stdout),buf,rc)<0) {
00097       cerr << "Write failed.\n";
00098       minet_perror("reason:");
00099       goto err;
00100     }
00101   }
00102 
00103  done:
00104  err:
00105   minet_close(fd);
00106   minet_close(cfd);
00107   minet_deinit();
00108   return 0;
00109 }
